name: Avoid Triggers with a very low comment/code ratio
description:
Triggers should have at least a ratio comment/code > X %
The threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will.
output:
This report lists all Triggers with comment/code ratio lower than X %
It provides the following information:
Trigger name, Trigger full name, comment/code ratio
rationale: Maintainability of the code is facilitated if there is documentation in the code. This rule will ensure there are enough comments within the Artifact
remediation: Enrich Artifact code with meaningful comments
